cities.tip: ✈️ Don't Miss: Hop on the London Eye or stroll across the iconic Tower Bridge.
cities.fact: 📍 Fun Fact: Did you know London is home to over 170 museums? Plus, Big Ben is actually the name of the bell, not the clock!

cities.tip: ✈️ Don't Miss: Enjoy the Eiffel Tower lit up at night and explore the Louvre.
cities.fact: 📍 Fun Fact: Paris has more dogs than children! It's one of the most pet-friendly cities in the world.

cities.tip: ✈️ Don't Miss: Toss a coin in the Trevi Fountain to ensure your return to this eternal city.
cities.fact: 📍 Fun Fact: Rome has over 2,000 fountains, including the iconic Trevi Fountain.

cities.tip: ✈️ Don't Miss: Stroll along Las Ramblas and explore Park Güell.
cities.fact: 📍 Fun Fact: The Sagrada Familia has been under construction since 1882 and is still not finished!

cities.tip: ✈️ Don't Miss: Cruise along the famous canals by boat or bike.
cities.fact: 📍 Fun Fact: There are more bicycles than people in Amsterdam!

cities.tip: ✈️ Don't Miss: Visit the Berlin Wall and the Reichstag.
cities.fact: 📍 Fun Fact: Berlin’s nightlife lasts all weekend long, and the city is nine times bigger than Paris.

cities.tip: ✈️ Don't Miss: Take a gondola ride along the canals at sunset.
cities.fact: 📍 Fun Fact: Venice has over 400 bridges, but only 4 cross the Grand Canal.

cities.tip: ✈️ Don't Miss: Relax in Retiro Park and visit the Royal Palace.
cities.fact: 📍 Fun Fact: Madrid is home to the world’s oldest restaurant, Casa Botín, open since 1725.

cities.tip: ✈️ Don't Miss: Walk across the Charles Bridge and admire the Prague Castle.
cities.fact: 📍 Fun Fact: The Prague Astronomical Clock is the oldest in the world, operating since 1410.

cities.tip: ✈️ Don't Miss: Visit the Prater Park and try the famous Sachertorte at one of its historic cafés.
cities.fact: 📍 Fun Fact: Vienna is known as the 'City of Music,' home to Mozart, Beethoven, and Schubert.
